Classes¶

class lab_tracker.classes.History¶

Bases: object

get(subject_identifier, order_desc=False)¶

Returns all values as a ordered queryset for a given subject_identifier.

get_as_list(subject_identifier)¶

Returns all values as a list in ascending chronological order for a given subject_identifier.

get_as_string(subject_identifier, mapped=True)¶

Returns a subject’s qualitative values joined as a string in ascending chronological order.

If mapped is True and a value_map is defined, map is inverted and a string of values is generated from the map.

get_current_value(subject_identifier)¶

Returns only the most current value for a given subject_identifier.

get_prep()¶

Returns a tuple of (test_code, test_key) where test_code may be a list.

This method defines:
test_code: a list of test_codes to search for in ResultItem. test_key: the common key for all instances of the HistoryModel for the subclass.

Users should override this.

get_value_map_prep()¶

Returns a dictionary that may be used to map values for storage in the HistoryModel to value formats used in ResultItem model.

Format {given this value: store this value}.

This is useful if update_prep adds results that are not described in the same format as the ResultItem model.

For example:
{‘A’: ‘POS’, ‘B’: NEG} will store POS and NEG given A, B. POS, NEG is how it is stored in the ResultItem model.

Also, the map is inverted to generate a string of values using this map returning ‘AB’ instead of ‘POSNEG’.

Users may override.

update_history_model(**kwargs)¶

Creates or Updates HistoryModel using get_or_create with kwargs.

update_now(subject_identifier)¶

Just updates the history values.

update_prep(subject_identifier, test_key)¶

Updates the HistoryModel if the user has other sources to include.

Users may override.

class lab_tracker.classes.SiteTracker¶

Bases: object

Registers tuples of (model_cls, history) from modules with a tracker module (tracker.py).

autodiscover()¶

Discovers tracker modules in your apps.

register(model_cls, history)¶

Registers tuples of (model_cls, history) from modules with a tracker module (tracker.py).

Args:
model_cls: a model class that

The global tracker is an instance of SiteTracker which is referred to in the tracker.py:

tracker.register(SubjectHivResult, HivHistory)
